title: Replication Groups: New column in output of SHOW command and Information Schema View | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_01 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

The output of the SHOW REPLICATION GROUPS command and the Information Schema
REPLICATION_GROUPS view view is as follows:
The output does not include the IS_LISTING_AUTO_FULFILLMENT_GROUP column.
The output includes IS_LISTING_AUTO_FULFILLMENT_GROUP, as follows:

TRUE if the replication group is used for
Cross-Cloud Auto-fulfillment.
FALSE otherwise.
